arma_base< elem_type, arma_derived > Struct Template Reference
[Arma_base]

#include <arma_base.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<typename elem_type, typename arma_derived>
struct arma_base< elem_type, arma_derived >

Class for static polymorphism, modelled after the "Curiously Recurring Template Pattern" (CRTP). Used for type-safe downcasting in functions that restrict their input(s) to be classes that are derived from arma_base (e.g. basic_mat, op_data, glue_data, diagview, subview). An arma_base object can be converted to a basic_mat object by the unwrap class.
